page.title: 04Wimborne Town page 2.
page.content: Wimborne has a new town crier. His name is Willium. There is a new shopping precinct where no-one is allowed to park their cars. The biggest shop is called Safeway. It sells food of all kinds. Then there is a chemist called Boots and a newsagent called T.H.S. News. Wimborne has a new library. The Bath Travel Agency shows where you can go on your holidays to foreign countries. The Allendale Community Centre has as an unusual piece of wood at the front of it. It is made from an elm tree trunk. The Fire Station is very close to the Ambulance Station.The Police Station is a little way away. Wimborne Clinic is near the Dentist's. Wimborne Cricket Club is near Safeway Shopping Centre. CLARE JENNINGS. AGED 9 YEARS.
